caption: MITRE ATT&CK® Tactic
description: The MITRE ATT&CK® Tactic object describes the tactic ID and/or name that is associated to an attack, as defined by ATT&CK® Matrix.
name: tactic

name.description: The tactic name that is associated with the attack technique, as defined by ATT&CK® Matrix. For example: Reconnaissance.

src_url.description: The versioned permalink of the attack tactic, as defined by ATT&CK® Matrix. For example: https://attack.mitre.org/versions/v14/tactics/TA0043/.

uid.description: The tactic ID that is associated with the attack technique, as defined by ATT&CK® Matrix. For example: TA0043.
